snippet: Multiple reports said the Washington Redskins, who were interested in Peyton Manning, had completed a blockbuster trade to acquire the second overall draft pick from the St. Louis Rams.
abstract: Multiple reports said the Washington Redskins, who were interested in Peyton Manning, had completed a blockbuster trade to acquire the second overall draft pick from the St. Louis Rams.

headline.main: Redskins Bet Future on Trade to Acquire Robert Griffin
